content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Good to meet you, Baihu Li. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. The rental price is negotiable, but I am looking for a fair and reasonable fee that will maximize my gains. How about we start with an offer of 1,200 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros per month. Thanks for the offer Mister Heine. I will pay you the first month's rent of 1,200 Euros on the day I move in.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: That's great to hear, Baihu Li. I appreciate your prompt payment and commitment to the rental agreement. I look forward to having you as a tenant in my apartment. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before moving in.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I don't have any questions or concerns. I will move in on the 1st of next month. I will pay the first month's rent of 1,200 Euros on the day I move in. I will sign the rental agreement on the day I move in as well.
Thank you again for the offer and for the opportunity to rent your apartment.
Goodbye.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: You're welcome, Baihu Li. I'm glad to hear that you're excited about moving into my apartment. If you have any questions or concerns before moving in, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
